description: The RCA HP59 "Pillows" Stereo Ear Buds feature a lightweight design for optimal comfort. With a contoured shape of the ear buds, they're sure to fit any size ear and reduce outside noise. They come in stylish bright colors that will fit anyone's style. Listen to your favorite music, without excess outside noise, and in style with the RCA HP59 “Pillows” Stereo Ear Buds.
title: RCA HP59BK Pillows Stereo Ear Buds (Black)
